• UNITS
  • FLASHCARDS

Dysgu Cymraeg

Robert Powell - Sylfaen Foundation (A2)

FLASHCARDS

Sentences worth memorising

I bought a newspaper yesterday

Prynais i bapur newydd ddoe

What did you buy yesterday?

Beth prynaist ti ddoe?

Did you buy anything yesterday?

Brynaist ti rywbeth ddoe?

I went to the cinema last month

Es i i'r sinema y mis diwetha

What did you do last night?

Beth wnest ti neithiwr?

When did you arrive today?

Pryd codoch chi heddiw?

Did you have a good time?

Gest ti amser da?

I had a very good time

Ces i amser da iwan

What did you learn?

Beth ddygaist ti?

Did you eat fruit yesterday?

Fwytaist ti ffrwythau ddoe?

Where did you stay on your last holiday?

Ble arhosaist ti ar dy wyliau diwetha?

She started last week

Dechreuoedd hi yr wythnos diwetha

She started walking when she was 9 months old

Dechreuoedd hi cerdded pan oedd hi'n naw mis oedd

She went to the office

Aeth hi i'r swyddfa

I know someone who speaks Italian

Dw i'n nabod rhywun sy'n siarad cymraeg

I don't know anyone who lives in France

Dw i ddim yn nabod neb sy'n byw yn Ffrainc

Do you know anyone who plays netball?

Wyt ti'n nabod rhywun sy'n chwarae pÃªl-rwyd
